chapter.title: GPU computing
chapter.para: Qlustar supports the most common GPU hardware types for GPU computing. There are hardware dependent packages and general development tools.

section.title: Nvidia CUDA GPU Platform
section.para: To support the CUDA GPU hardware platform, Nvidia provides the necessary kernel drivers as well as the user-space CUDA Toolkit for software development. Pre-built, up-to-date Nvidia kernel modules are available for all Qlustar Kernels and the Qlustar Nvidia image module can be added to Qlustar images for full support of the newset Nvidia hardware on GPU enabled compute nodes. Within Qlustar, the functionality of the CUDA Toolkit is split into a number of different packages.

section.title: CUDA
section.para: The packages for development are split Need: nvidia-cuda-toolkit, nvidia-cuda-dev
